mng: simple, uncomplicated, letter, to choose, to select, bamboo strips used for writing (old)

exm.mng: simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]
simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]
to write characters in simplified form, to simplify a book
to be abbreviated to, abbreviation, short form
